lead_paragraph: Going into Tuesday night’s game, the Yankees’ Marcus Thames was riding a wave of homers — six in his last five starts, dating to last Tuesday.
snippet: Going into Tuesday night’s game, the Yankees’ Marcus Thames was riding a wave of homers — six in his last five starts, dating to last Tuesday.

headline.main: In the Lineup, Out of the Park: Thames on a Home Run Roll
headline.seo: Yankees’ Thames on a Home Run Roll
